===JQuery UI Sortable as Wicket behavior example===

*[http://jqueryui.com/demos/draggable/ Original javascript version can be found here]*

*Prerequisites:* Your wicket application is configured to use JQWicket as described in the [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket "Quick Start"] guide. Additionaly to the jquery core library you have to add "jquery ui" to the JQWicket's config.

*Description:* This example demonstrates how to integrate JQuery UI Draggable with the wicket components using JQWicket.


Simple draggable label:
{{{
Label draggable = new Label("draggable", "i'm a draggable label");
draggable.add(JQBehaviors.draggable());
add(draggable);
}}}

Draggable label with the javascript callback function:
{{{
final Label draggable = new Label("draggable", "i'm a draggable label");
DraggableOptions options = new DraggableOptions()
       .dragEvent(JQuery.$(draggable).css("color", "red"));
draggable.add(JQBehaviors.draggable(options));
add(draggable);
}}}
